title: News24.com | Why is Italy's coronavirus fatality rate so high?
description: Amid persistent questions over Italy's growing death toll, experts warn other countries could soon be in its position.
content:
The numbers have been dizzying. Four hundred thirty-three. Six hundred twenty-seven. Seven hundred ninety-three.
For weeks now, the daily briefings by Italy's civil protection agency have been providing grim updates on the number of people killed by the new … [+7754 chars]
